title: Who are you guys rooting for at MSI?
body:
I personally am conflicted. Unfortunately for me, by the strangest twist of fate all the teams I wanted to make it except for one ended up 2nd in their region (GJ AHQ), so I'm not sure who I'm going to root for. I want to root for AHQ, since they're the only team I supported that made it, but I somewhat want to root for TSM because I want NA to have another strong international showing. I want to support FNC cuz yellowstar is one of my favorite players ever, so it's really hard to make a choice on a single team. The rest I don't really care about, but based on regional strength, everyone expects EDG or SKT to win.

Anyways, I'm really excited for this competition regardless, so I want to know who you guys are rooting for and why if you don't mind sharing :)

replies.body: I know people like to trash on 'em, but TSM man. The dream.

I am not rooting for anyone. I just want to see good games. I want to see how much SEA has progressed when they face NA/EU.
Same with Turkey's BJK or whichever it is.

I think the most exciting thing will be the CN/KR match up. Though I really hate the "Only 1 Sub" rule. SKT has 2 subs for more total strategy. I mean Easyhoon and Tom were on the team when they qualified for MSI, but Bengi/Faker are noticeably better in terms of mechanics and pressure. EDG also have a ton of subs (2 main ones), but they are less focused driven on strategy differences they can make with subs.

Le sigh.
Fanatic and Im NA....that team is so fun to watch. THE GOD HUNI
I just don't want to see more Korean domination because it's gotten old.
